label: DATV-Red V3
info:
- V1.something
   - It hath the spectrum
   - I clickith and it tunith
   - I clickith and it setith stuff
   - more control
   - refactor code
   - we no longer need all the files...
   - restarting pluto sets strange settings.
   - So we have explicitly set certain mqtt command in a certain order
   - Rx and Tx offsets
   - CTRL click tunes longmynd
   - Fix bugs for CTRL click
   - rx has seperate endpoint on API
   - uplink correction
   - Channel busy, you shall not PASS!!
   - add device config, 
   - fixed longmynd frequency and sr messages we send in KHz and KS
   - spectrum watchdog only watches you when transmitting . . .
   - flow dependency install script `.\install_dependencies.bat` RUN IT!!!
   - Remove FECMODE from config-tx.ini
   - Set it for each static profile 1-7
   - Now variable fec set lowest 1/4 for qpsk and doesn't recalculate
   - Will add support for 8psk etc.
   - Fixed state injectors
     - restores state after pluto reboot  
   - If Restore state is Orange, PRESS IT!
   - Channel calibration.
     - [How To](https://youtu.be/-ZdQOVg26_0)
 - V1.9.9
   - TS analysis - just for checking that TS is okay... 
     - Once tuned to signal, press TS analyse to display TS info(currently just callsign pop up)...
     - There is room for more information gathering here as ffpbrobe is very verbose.
   - Spectrum tuning bar has got a memory
   - Constellation rate calculation changes, as per DL5OCD_Michael
   - Tunes minitioune software by CTRL+ALT clicking
   - bugfixes
   - Consume Open Tuner websocket status, not useful atm...
   - Prep for GUI setup, we can enumerate all current audio and video devices using ffmpeg
   - Spectrum and band color pickers => ALL THE COLOURS OF THE RAINBOW!
   - latest ffmpeg build
   - node red task scheduler xml, import with windows task scheduler to have it start on logon
 - V1.993-c(chat)
   - Minitioune spawn routine improvements.
     - killing node red does not kill it. . .
     - instead of spawing each time we deploy changes...
   - Rx top tune bar
   - Tx tune bar
   - Spectrum has better memory...
   - Bitrate calculation changes as per DL5OCD
     - Changed the function to use lookup tables
   - ffplay switch, off by default.
   - rebuild ffmpeg, with vvc...
   - Chat added
     - This prompted a reshuffle of GUI
   - Planning
 - V1.994
   - ffplay controls
    - Image size
    - Start up volume
    - on top ? 
    - tx clicky bug. . .
 - V1.995
   - calculations
 - V1.996
   - NCO offset after SR change bug workaround
   - bitrate calculations
   - Beacon RX capability 
   - use Minitioune toggle
 - V2.0-beta
   - TSRate calculations, be gone, used the pluto's expected TS bitrate `/device/tx/dvbs2/ts/bitrate`
     - This makes the calculations very accurate
       - This would be part of profile settings in future, how video rates are calculated or set
   - Setup from GUI(bye config-tx.ini) 
     - almost there
   - Try and remove all DATV-NotSoEasy files, if its an ini file its a setting...
     - almost there
   - No more presets, rework in progress.
 - V2.1
   - VVC calculation adjustments
   - TS rate divider should be 1000 its already in bytes...
   - Track ffplay windows position
   - Orgainizing things
   - chagning frame changes FEC table entries
     - short frame and 9/10 doesn't work
     - FEC table updates based on `modulation` and `frame` type
   - We have completely removed DATV-NotSoEasy
     - removed static profile loading
     - removed `config-tx.ini` and `DATV-TX.bat`
   - Profile saver and loading
     - click `SAVER` and the profile you'd like to update.
     - Only saves settings related to ffmpeg
   - Now we need to add input boxes for all the things we put in the `ffmpeg string builder` function
 - V2.2 
   - Bundled exe
   - New ffmpeg build `03-Nov-23`
 - V2.3
  - Includes shared build as well ffmpeg_
  - removed libx265 bench video
  - call ffmpeg directly
    - no more escaping strings
  - codec switch
    - for easy tweaking
 - V2.4
   - Made chat bigger
     - User bar as well...
   - Fix TX spectrum clicky bug
   - Dynamic MQTT subscription
     - We load settings from file `pluto.json`
   - New codec settings in ffmpeg string builder
     - fixes old driver issues - `UPDATE YOUR DRIVERS!`
     - Node red also calls the absoulute path...
 - V2.4.1
   - Service provider displays
   - Gain button arrangement
   - frequency and gain saved with profiles 
 - V2.4.2
   - Pass mode bug fix, kinda... 
   - Set callsign button
     - Reboots pluto
     - Is needed for first time users  
     - No more duplicate user 
   - Profiles
     - more settings XD
   - no more shortcuts
     - dvbs2_gui path
     - vlc path
   - Shared ffmpeg build `09-Nov-2023`
 - V2.4.3
   - set callsign from `pluto.json` in `device.json` when starting app
     - we do not need to wait 5s
   - VVC bitrate `800`
     - Added `vvenc params`
       - Framerate
       - Size
   - open browser restored
   - Its getting harder to break things . . .
 - V2.4.5
   - Fixes `powershell` script permissions
   - This should remedy blank stats in app
   - Clicking signal tunes minitiouner
   - Tx parameters can now only be set by click on channel bars
   - Removed unused state check `API`
   - Fixed toggle button states
     - Use minitiouner
     - Use ffplay
     - ffplay on top
   - Rebooting and power kill handling
     - Press restore when pluto connects
     - this is mostly automatic 
   - INPUT mode
   - Audio channels
   - UDP and RTMP addressess
   - Added back db below beacon on spectrum
   - Audio sample rate added
   - Fixed ffplay powershell checking
   - calculation node update   
   - even better startup restore
 - V2.5
   - New GUI layout
   - `dashboard.json` will keep gui related stuff, like extra flow parameters
     - `use_chat` default `true`
     - `use_switch` default `false`
     - `tasmota_switch_url` network address of sonoff switch
     - Added Sonoff basic tasmota switch for amp
     - This flow is disabled by default 
   - On air timer
   - ffmpeg path variable


Version 3
 - Renamed project to `DATV-Red`
   - Removes connection between this software and the rest...
 - Now `cross platform`
 - Paths for ffmpeg execs
   - this is for `linux`  
 - `Linux` settings that worked under testing
   - run `/scripts/install.sh`
     - Installs node and xclip
     - not sure about the others... 
   - Input types tested working, `UDP` and `RTMP`
 - Rx control
   - You need to make sure the pluto can send data to `230.0.0.2:1234` on your network
   - `config.txt` on pluto
     - under `[USB_ETHERNET]` add `gateway_eth = x.x.x.x` with the IP of you network gateway
   - VLC for playing TS
   - Or use ffplay
 - Signal report
   - Copies it to the clipboard so you may paste it using `CTRL+V`.
 - Rx timer for onboard longmynd
 - DVB-GSE
   - This is probably the most awesome thing!

info:
This was hacked together on a Saterday afternoon usign the javascript available on the [batc](https://eshail.batc.org.uk/wb) site
Since path referencing cannot work this way, I had to include all the JS and CSS imports in one html file, minified ofc.
This works...
